title: PMS 2.0 491 - THE NFL IS BACK, Buccaneers vs. Cowboys Preview, Ian Rapoport, Dan Orlovsky, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys chat at length about tonight's Thursday Night Football game between the Cowboys and Buccaneers, Pat's Super Boost at FanDuel, why it seems like the  Buccaneers are going to blow out the Cowboys, what some of their best bets are, and everything else as we head into another NFL season. Joining the program to wrap up everything going on around the NFL before the start of week 1, NFL Network Insider, Ian Rapoport joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about the TJ Watt situation, what the injury status of several guys are this weekend, Davante Adams saying there was no chance of getting a deal done with the Packers before the start of the season, and much much more (52:40-1:13:34). Next, joining Pat and AJ to chat about his top 5 offenses going into the NFL season is 12 year NFL veteran, ESPN NFL Analyst and friend of the show, Dan Orlovsky. Dan defends his egregious takes and gives his prediction on tonight's Thursday Night Football game (1:13:36-1:22:03). Later, Pat and AJ chat more about tonight's game, give their Super Bowl predictions for this year, and celebrate the fact that we no longer are without NFL football (1:24:14-1:46:04). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
